title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
content: Happy Holidays, everyone. Here's a little (actually, quite large) treat to start things off. We are selling our new 2024 Silver Mini Manhole Cover Prototype 1/1 to help fund the first couple official serial numbered pieces. The official serial numbered pieces will be limited to 10 only, and the price will be .25 BTC each. However, this special prototype 1/1 is being offered for a limited time at 50% OFF! Product: 2024 Silver Mini Manhole CoverMetal: SilverPurity: .999+Weight: One KiloSerial Number: Prototype, 1/1 Also adding a few other prototypes for sale.2021 Special Edition (Red) Roll Prototype 1/1 + Oversize DOGE Coin | $500 $2502021 DOGE Special Edition (Yellow) Roll Prototype 1/1 + Oversize DOGE Coin | $500 $2502019 Bank Bag Prototype 1/1 | $250 $125Please feel free to ask questions. Regards,Chris@TBPCo.

comments.author: SurfinPanda
comments.body: I’ll take the bank bag prototype.SP

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Sh*t, I din't notice the other prototypes That bag sure looks nice, nice catch Panda...
